trans-unit.source:
\n

Provides methods for enabling and disabling events from event sources.

\n
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xxxxxxxx xxxxxxx xxx xxxxxxxx xxx xxxxxxxxx xxxxxx xxxx xxxxx xxxxxxx.$$x$$x

trans-unit.source:
\n

Disables all events for the specified event source.

\n
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xxxxxxxx xxx xxxxxx xxx xxx xxxxxxxxx xxxxx xxxxxx.$$x$$x

trans-unit.source:
\n

The event source to disable events for.

\n
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xxx xxxxx xxxxxx xx xxxxxxx xxxxxx xxx.$$x$$x

trans-unit.source:
\n

Enables events for the specified event source that has the specified verbosity level or lower.

\n
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xxxxxxx xxxxxx xxx xxx xxxxxxxxx xxxxx xxxxxx xxxx xxx xxx xxxxxxxxx xxxxxxxxx xxxxx xx xxxxx.$$x$$x

trans-unit.source:
\n

The event source to enable events for.

\n
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xxx xxxxx xxxxxx xx xxxxxx xxxxxx xxx.$$x$$x

trans-unit.source:
\n

The level of events to enable.

\n
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xxx xxxxx xx xxxxxx xx xxxxxx.$$x$$x

trans-unit.source:
\n

Enables events for the specified event source that has the specified verbosity level or lower, and matching keyword flags.

\n
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xxxxxxx xxxxxx xxx xxx xxxxxxxxx xxxxx xxxxxx xxxx xxx xxx xxxxxxxxx xxxxxxxxx xxxxx xx xxxxx$ xxx xxxxxxxx xxxxxxx xxxxx.$$x$$x

trans-unit.source:
\n

The event source to enable events for.

\n
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xxx xxxxx xxxxxx xx xxxxxx xxxxxx xxx.$$x$$x

trans-unit.source:
\n

The level of events to enable.

\n
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xxx xxxxx xx xxxxxx xx xxxxxx.$$x$$x

trans-unit.source:
\n

The keyword flags necessary to enable the events.

\n
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xxx xxxxxxx xxxxx xxxxxxxxx xx xxxxxx xxx xxxxxx.$$x$$x

trans-unit.source:
\n

Enables events for the specified event source that has the specified verbosity level or lower, matching event keyword flag, and matching arguments.

\n
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xxxxxxx xxxxxx xxx xxx xxxxxxxxx xxxxx xxxxxx xxxx xxx xxx xxxxxxxxx xxxxxxxxx xxxxx xx xxxxx$ xxxxxxxx xxxxx xxxxxxx xxxx$ xxx xxxxxxxx xxxxxxxxx.$$x$$x

trans-unit.source:
\n

The event source to enable events for.

\n
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xxx xxxxx xxxxxx xx xxxxxx xxxxxx xxx.$$x$$x

trans-unit.source:
\n

The level of events to enable.

\n
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xxx xxxxx xx xxxxxx xx xxxxxx.$$x$$x

trans-unit.source:
\n

The keyword flags necessary to enable the events.

\n
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xxx xxxxxxx xxxxx xxxxxxxxx xx xxxxxx xxx xxxxxx.$$x$$x

trans-unit.source:
\n

The arguments to be matched to enable the events.

\n
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xxx xxxxxxxxx xx xx xxxxxxx xx xxxxxx xxx xxxxxx.$$x$$x

trans-unit.source:
\n

Gets a small non-negative number that represents the specified event source.

\n
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xxxx x xxxxx xxx$xxxxxxxx xxxxxx xxxx xxxxxxxxxx xxx xxxxxxxxx xxxxx xxxxxx.$$x$$x

trans-unit.source:
\n

The event source to find the index for.

\n
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xxx xxxxx xxxxxx xx xxxx xxx xxxxx xxx.$$x$$x

trans-unit.source:
\n

A small non-negative number that represents the specified event source.

\n
trans-unit.target: $x$x$X xxxxx xxx$xxxxxxxx xxxxxx xxxx xxxxxxxxxx xxx xxxxxxxxx xxxxx xxxxxx.$$x$$x

trans-unit.source:
\n

Called for all existing event sources when the event listener is created and when a new event source is attached to the listener.

\n
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xxxxxx xxx xxx xxxxxxxx xxxxx xxxxxxx xxxx xxx xxxxx xxxxxxxx xx xxxxxxx xxx xxxx x xxx xxxxx xxxxxx xx xxxxxxxx xx xxx xxxxxxxx.$$x$$x

trans-unit.source:
\n

The event source.

\n
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xxx xxxxx xxxxxx.$$x$$x

trans-unit.source:
\n

Called whenever an event has been written by an event source for which the event listener has enabled events.

\n
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xxxxxx xxxxxxxx xx xxxxx xxx xxxx xxxxxxx xx xx xxxxx xxxxxx xxx xxxxx xxx xxxxx xxxxxxxx xxx xxxxxxx xxxxxx.$$x$$x

trans-unit.source:
\n

The event arguments that describe the event.

\n
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xxx xxxxx xxxxxxxxx xxxx xxxxxxxx xxx xxxxx.$$x$$x
